subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Gregory Campbell, on crutches, rejoined the Bruins before Game 3 of the Stanley Cup finals, shrugging off praise for finishing a shift despite a broken leg in the previous round.
snippet: Gregory Campbell, on crutches, rejoined the Bruins before Game 3 of the Stanley Cup finals, shrugging off praise for finishing a shift despite a broken leg in the previous round.
